DisplayName.Value: Dans Parking Lots with Parks Pack

ShortDescription.Value: Collection of parking lots with built in parks.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Dans Parking Lots with Parks Pack * Parks are located under thhe Parks tab in game.
## Added Assets: * Extra-Small Sized Car Park (29 spaces) with a small space for all park types. * Medium Sized Car Park (230 spaces) with a long park through the centre that includes all park types. * Large Sized Car Park (286 spaces) with a large park area with all park types.
More Parking Lots to come!
## Credits: * Thank you to Konsi for all your help with assets. * Thank you to StarQ for assisting with the new asset format and thumbnails. * Thank you to TDW for Asset Icon Library. * Thank you to Chamelon for the thumbnail tool.
Publish.ChangeLog: ## 1.0.3 * Reconfigured Upkeep, Attractiveness, Initial Cost of parks * Added lighting to the small park * Replace one carpark with a parking booth on the large carpark and added a workplace.
